title: Crypto impersonation scandal: Westport Police triumph in retrieving $3M from Kraken
description: In a remarkable turn of events, the Westport Police, in collaboration with the Connecticut State Police Organized Crime Task Force, have managed to trace and recover a staggering $3.2 million in cryptocurrency that had been deceitfully taken from an unsuspecting local. This audacious scam, which involved a meticulous impersonation of the renowned cryptocurrency exchange Kraken, ... Read more

title: VanEck announces generous donation from Ethereum Strategy ETF profits
description: In a groundbreaking move, investment management giant VanEck has announced its intention to donate a portion of its profits from the Ethereum Strategy ETF. This decision comes ahead of the anticipated trading launch on October 2, and it has the cryptocurrency community buzzing with excitement and speculation about the potential impact on Ethereum’s price.
